name: sk
description: A premium weather PWA that tracks real-time and historical temperatures for 14 Indian cities. Installable on phone via "Add to Home Screen".

scripts.build: mkdir -p www/lib www/fonts && cp index.html style.css app.js cities.js manifest.json sw.js www/ && cp -r icons www/ && cp -r lib/* www/lib/ && cp -r fonts/* www/fonts/
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync ios
